title: Check the reviews
description: When navigating to a specific hike or walk, see what other people think of it by checking the reviews

title: Tell your story
description: You can add your own photos or tips and share them with the community. They might even like or comment on your post

title: Share your adventures
description: When you finished a hike and want to tell your friends or family all about it, you can share it with them through Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp and more
